hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that :the Messenger of Allah (saas) said: "It is necessary that you do not become hasty." It was said: "What does being hasty mean, O Messenger of Allah?" He said: "When one says: 'I supplicated to Allah but Allah did not answer me

chapter.ara-name: باب يُسْتَجَابُ لأَحَدِكُمْ مَا لَمْ يَعْجَلْ
chapter.eng-name: Your Supplication Will Be Answered So Long As You Do Not Become Hasty
